includedAssets.title: Seven Thirty-Seven
includedAssets.synopsis: Walt devises a scheme to negate the threat of Tuco, but things don't quite go to plan.

includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Walt devises a scheme to negate the threat of Tuco, but things don't quite go to plan.

includedAssets.title: Grilled
includedAssets.synopsis: Held prisoner by Tuco, Walt and Jesse try to escape.

includedAssets.title: Bit By A Dead Bee
includedAssets.altTitle: S2, Ep3 - Bit By A Dead Bee
includedAssets.synopsis: Walt and Jesse try to come up with alibis to explain their time away.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Walt and Jesse try to come up with alibis to explain their time away.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Walt and Jesse try to come up with alibis to explain their time away.

includedAssets.title: Down
includedAssets.synopsis: Skyler grows tired of Walt's behaviour, while Jesse has to resort to living in the RV.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Skyler grows tired of Walt's behaviour, while Jesse has to resort to living in the RV.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Skyler grows tired of Walt's behaviour, while Jesse has to resort to living in the RV.

includedAssets.title: Breakage
includedAssets.synopsis: Walt's health begins to improve, while Jesse develops an interest in his new neighbour Jane. However, Hank is promoted and begins investigating Heisenberg.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Walt's health begins to improve, while Jesse develops an interest in his new neighbour Jane. Hank is promoted and begins investigating Heisenberg.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Walt's health begins to improve, while Jesse develops an interest in his new neighbour Jane. However, Hank is promoted and begins investigating Heisenberg.

includedAssets.title: Peekaboo
includedAssets.synopsis: Jesse finds himself in too deep when he visits the home of the couple who ripped off Skinny Pete, while a call from Gretchen Schwartz threatens to expose Walt's lies.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Jesse visits the home of the couple who ripped off Skinny Pete, while a call from Gretchen Schwartz threatens to expose Walt's lies.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Jesse finds himself in too deep when he visits the home of the couple who ripped off Skinny Pete, while a call from Gretchen Schwartz threatens to expose Walt's lies.

includedAssets.title: Negro Y Azul
includedAssets.synopsis: Walt takes advantage of Jesse's new hard-man reputation, while Skyler decides to get a job and Hank learns just how dangerous his new one can be.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Walt takes advantage of Jesse's new hard-man reputation, while Skyler decides to get a job and Hank learns just how dangerous his new one can be.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Walt takes advantage of Jesse's new hard-man reputation, while Skyler decides to get a job and Hank learns just how dangerous his new one can be.

includedAssets.title: Better Call Saul
includedAssets.synopsis: When Jesse's friend Badger is arrested, Walt and Jesse turn to slippery lawyer Saul Goodman to get him off. Meanwhile, Hank is suffering from PTSD.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: When Jesse's friend Badger is arrested, Walt and Jesse turn to slippery lawyer Saul Goodman to get him off. Meanwhile, Hank is suffering from PTSD.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: When Jesse's friend Badger is arrested, Walt and Jesse turn to slippery lawyer Saul Goodman to get him off. Meanwhile, Hank is suffering from PTSD.

includedAssets.title: 4 Days Out
includedAssets.synopsis: In a bid to add to their cash pile, Walt and Jesse drive into the desert for a big cooking session - but disaster strikes when they find themselves stranded.

includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: In a bid to add to their cash pile, Walt and Jesse drive into the desert for a big cooking session - but disaster strikes when they find themselves stranded.

includedAssets.title: Over
includedAssets.synopsis: Walt gets some positive health news, but struggles to act upbeat at a family get together. Meanwhile, Jesse clarifies his relationship with Jane.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Walt gets some positive health news, but struggles to act upbeat at a family get together. Meanwhile, Jesse clarifies his relationship with Jane.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Walt gets some positive health news, but struggles to act upbeat at a family get together. Meanwhile, Jesse clarifies his relationship with Jane.

includedAssets.title: Mandala
includedAssets.synopsis: Saul introduces Walter and Jesse to a new dealer called Gus, but Jesse and Jane are sliding further into addiction. Meanwhile, Skyler uncovers an unwelcome secret about her boss.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Saul introduces Walter and Jesse to a new dealer called Gus, but Jesse is sliding further into addiction. Skyler uncovers a secret abut her boss.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Saul introduces Walter and Jesse to a new dealer called Gus, but Jesse and Jane are sliding further into addiction. Meanwhile, Skyler uncovers an unwelcome secret about her boss.

includedAssets.title: Phoenix
includedAssets.synopsis: Walt finishes the delivery job, but holds Jesse's cut of the cash hostage until he can prove he is clean. Walt Jr solicits donations for his dad's medical costs.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Walt finishes the delivery, but holds Jesse's cut of the cash hostage until he can prove he is clean. Walt Jr solicits donations for Walt's treatment.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Walt finishes the delivery job, but holds Jesse's cut of the cash hostage until he can prove he is clean. Walt Jr solicits donations for his dad's medical costs.

includedAssets.title: Abq
includedAssets.synopsis: A devastated Jesse blames himself for Jane's death, Walt Jr's website attracts media attention and Walt lets something slip to Skyler.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: A devastated Jesse blames himself for Jane's death, Walt Jr's website attracts media attention and Walt lets something slip to Skyler.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: A devastated Jesse blames himself for Jane's death, Walt Jr's website attracts media attention and Walt lets something slip to Skyler.

includedAssets.title: Season 2
includedAssets.synopsis: Walter and Jesse expand the business, but Jesse enters a downward spiral when he strikes up a relationship with former heroin addict Jane (Kristen Ritter).
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Walter and Jesse expand the business, but Jesse enters a downward spiral when he strikes up a relationship with former heroin addict Jane.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Walter and Jesse expand the business, but Jesse enters a downward spiral when he strikes up a relationship with former heroin addict Jane (Kristen Ritter).

includedIn.title: Breaking Bad
includedIn.synopsis: When mild-mannered chemistry teacher Walter White is diagnosed with cancer, he decides to risk everything to ensure his family's future. Teaming up with low-level drug dealer Jesse Pinkman, Walt begins cooking and selling methamphetamine to make some quick cash, but the pair gradually become immersed in a dark and dangerous new world.
includedIn.shortSynopsis: A mild-mannered chemistry teacher turns his talents to cooking meth after he's diagnosed with cancer.
includedIn.mediumSynopsis: When mild-mannered chemistry teacher Walter White is diagnosed with cancer, he decides to risk everything to ensure his family's future. Teaming up with low-level drug dealer Jesse Pinkman, Walt begins cooking and selling methamphetamine to make some quick cash, but the pair gradually become immersed in a dark and dangerous new world.
